he Caves of Ghazz were a series of caves on the island of Saishu, off the coast of Koryo in northeast Kara-Tur.
They were a legendary site but their exact location was unknown. It was said the mirror of perfection had been hidden there since around 607 DR.This is 750 years before the setting date of 1357 DR.
The Caves of Ghazz were one of the local legends that Dan Zor, the former king and governor of Saishu, wished to investigate. By 1357 DR, he sought adventurers who would seek out the caves for him.
